extendedInfo.description: Whether you live in the Windy City or you're just passing by, Transit Tracks: Chicago is an indispensable tool for tracking real-time CTA bus and train information. Transit Tracks was designed to be simple-to-use and lightweight - no frills, no confusing menus.- Bus and train times pulled straight from the CTA Bus Tracker and CTA Train Tracker. - Bookmark stops you use often.- Mapping feature finds all nearby bus and train stops.Feedback (bugs, suggestions, etc.) is definitely appreciated!

reviews.title: Fantastically accurate app!
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using this app over a couple of iterations and this current update is phenomenal. Accurate to the minute of a train or bus arrival. I don\'t know how they could improve it.
reviews.author: Alex Koslowsky

reviews.title: Love this app
reviews.comment: This app has been great and much more accurate and user friendly than any other I could find. I just wish you could delete old routes. Fix that and it\'s a 5 star.
reviews.author: Spencer Meyer

reviews.title: Good for what it does
reviews.comment: A quick look shows it to be functional, and the implementation of the search box is a big plus for a massive agency like CTA.  I see some reviews commenting on accuracy of prediction times, but that is a function of the underlying server, not the app.  The app gets a prediction, it displays it, after possibly massaging it for prediction age.  Find nearby stops is interesting, because an app dealing with this type of server has no foreknowledge of stop location without contacting the server, and to my knowledge, that server has no \"search by location\" feature, so this involves some innovative programming.  How do I know this?  I wrote jata, just another transit app, so I can get predictions in Worcester MA.  Because Worcester uses a Clever Devices server, it also works with Chicago. Oh! and there was a complaint about \"Transaction limit for current day has been exceeded.\"  This is a result of some arbitrary limit set up by CTA and / or Clever Devices.  It supposedly can be resolved by issuing a larger quota, but the requirements for this are not published anywhere.
reviews.author: Joe Wronski

reviews.title: Nice, but flawed with update
reviews.comment: This app is extremely useful, but with the new update the refresh button is so close to the new switch direction button that it gets pressed on accident, and you don\'t realize until it\'s too late. Just move it somewhere else. Easy enough
reviews.author: Christian King

reviews.comment: I give it 4 stars because it has been more reliable than the other app I tried, & more accurate as well. Good job.\tSee above.
reviews.author: lateef carrere

reviews.title: Good for locals only
reviews.comment: As a soon to be tourist to Chicago, this app is very disappointing.   A map of the overall train system would be helpful.  I cant get from O\'Hare to my hotel using this app unless I know what stop I want to get off at
reviews.author: T Mac

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Love the app. The update has a few issues: I have saved favorits with a south direction and when I choose these it defaults to the north direction. Pls fix.
reviews.author: hendrick onderdonk

reviews.title: Accurate and useful
reviews.comment: Great app, reliable and very helpful for my commuting.
reviews.author: corn bouk

reviews.title: Loses a star because location couldn\'t be ascertained inside
reviews.comment: Location aware only via GPS? I was in a restaurant waiting for my carryout and wanted to know when the bus would be there, and the app had no idea where I was. As soon as I stepped outside it was fine.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Slow!!
reviews.comment: It\'s very slow!! The bus gets here before it refreshes
reviews.author: Yazmin saldivar

reviews.title: CTA tracking
reviews.comment: This is by far my fav application because in Chicago\'s unpredictable weather on a daily basis it helps!
reviews.author: Jada P Powell

reviews.title: *sadface*
reviews.comment: Very upset recently had to reset my phone, now that I\'ve reinstalled it...it won\'t let me get the times keeps saying REINSTALL!!!!! IT WON\'T WORK :(
reviews.author: LADY SHA

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: It did prompt me to reinstall. I did so and the updates are smooth and nice ideas for a tracker.
reviews.author: Yetta Hussein

reviews.title: Database Error
reviews.comment: Get constant database error and message to reinstall even after reinstalled
reviews.author: Aaron Cook

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Could you all add the Red line reconstruction routes??? Thanx
reviews.author: Lena Tidwell

reviews.title: Trust issues
reviews.comment: Some days it works accurately. Others works like a joke. This morning lied to me many times. You have to decide whether you will be a reliable tool or a disappointment  L
reviews.author: claudia chiarito

reviews.title: Better than any other CTA app
reviews.comment: Really love this app.  I use it everyday and it\'s better than the cta apps on the iphone. 10 stars of I could.
reviews.author: Monica Berry

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Fast, easy, and best of all, accurate. One feature request I would pay for, a widget for the home screen that I can program to update during my usual travel times.
reviews.author: Kevin Lyon

reviews.title: Favorites
reviews.comment: Can I edit my favorites I would like to delete some. Before the update a lot of the bus stops say stop could not be found
reviews.author: Brenna Ginsberg

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Has not once given me a train  time. One time it said it was fetching times, but then it failed. Garbage.
reviews.author: Aimee Russell
